Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I have the challenge with my idea to transfer kerbals from a vessel to my Station without EVA.

I try a lot of combination on the Station but doesent work.

On the startramp some configurations work but latest in the Orbit doesnt work the Transfer anymore.

I use some mods and of course CLS.

Can some give me an idea or help how this can work?

 

Thanks and regards

Christian

 

Edited October 7, 2016 by spacehorse
